Cam::

She didn't understand what was going on, but she understood him when 
he asked her not to mention the mommy bot of the baby to the daddy 
bot of the baby, "I get it Windlord. I won't. So can I go outside and 
play now? huh? Can I?"

>

Her

> hands... Listen me, Cam, Her dad is very sad and he tried to help 
her 
> mom... but he's very hurted and if he goes he will die, I hardly 
> bring him back... Now don't mention her mom infront of him... 
Agree, 
> Cam?"
